column3:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15606](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15606.html) ([experimental] UTXO snapshots by jamesob)

utACK 866c805. Verified refactor in 9453018fdc8f02d42832374bcf1d6e3a1df02281 and moved code in 6e051f3d323af1d209c02e7a4319834f1947ffa7. Not so sure about change in 866c8058a706931f025335b3e794ed2f4d287918 just because I'm not familiar with net processing.

```
net_processing.cpp:3186:13: error: calling function 'AddToCompactExtraTransactions' requires holding mutex 'g_cs_orphans' exclusively [-Werror,-Wthread-safety-analysis]
            AddToCompactExtraTransactions(removedTx);
            ^
Commit 866c805\n\nNot sure if `orphan_work_set` should be guarded by `g_cs_orphans`?

No, it's only accessed from the network processing thread like vRecvGetData, so it doesn't need locking.\n\nIdeally it should move to net_processing's structures instead of CNode, along with a bunch of other things, but I wanted to keep the diff small for now.
